DOC.brief_summary: Each subject give tafamidis . After swallow single tafamidis capsule , tafamidis blood concentration measure periodically one week . After 20 day , subject take different form tafamidis capsule process repeat . Tafamidis concentration two different formulation compare determine approximately .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Two Different Tafamidis Formulations
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchild bear potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 Kg total body weight 50 Kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Use prescription nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day 5 half life ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication .
